alert.note: Alert for Camp; Cass; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Morris; Rusk; Titus; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:44AM CDT until June 13 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Western Harrison County in northeastern Texas... North central Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Southern Morris County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Titus County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Camp County in northeastern Texas... Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 744 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cedar Springs, or 12 miles northeast of Gilmer, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Longview, White Oak, Gladewater, Gilmer, Hallsville, Jefferson, Lone Star, Ore City, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Berea, Harleton, Diana, Rosewood, Jenkins, West Mountain, Cedar Springs, Woodlawn, Lakeport and Avinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Cass; Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Morris; Rusk; Titus; Upshur
